entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • GetRuntimeDirectory for WindowsDesktop apps #91182
  • Rfc2898DeriveBytes.Pbkdf2 is trimming unfriendly #91181
    9.0.0
  • ServiceProviderEngineScope captures the same object twice into a list of disposables #91179
  • LoggerMessageGenerator optimizations #91178
  • Assertion failed '!varTypeIsSIMD(vns->TypeOfVN(argVN))' during 'Do value numbering' #91175
  • Assertion failed '!varTypeIsUnsigned(type) || varTypeIsSmall(type)' during 'Generate code' #91174
  • Assertion failed 'node->IsUnusedValue() && "found an unmarked unused value"' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #91173
  • Assertion failed '!childNode->isContainableHWIntrinsic()' during 'Lowering nodeinfo' #91170
  • BigInteger unsigned right shift operation is poorly designed and exposes implementation details #91169
  • What are the minimum required files to deploy a Mono 6 console app on macOS? #91167
  • Should Thread.Priority set nice on Linux? #91165

Closed

  • SignedCms.CheckSignature fails on ECDSA signatures signed by Win32 #91168
  • Can't run blazor hosted wasm when BlazorWebAssembly project's has private tags for references #86942
    Future
  • [Browser WASM] Severity Code Description Project File Line Suppression State Error NU1102 Unable to find package Microsoft.NETCore.App.Runtime.Mono.browser-wasm with version (= 7.0.9) - Found 47 version(s) in nuget.org [ Nearest version: 8.0.0-preview.1.23110.8 ] - Found 0 version(s) in Microsoft Visual Studio Offline Packages - Found 0 version(s) in #88898
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Support Windows based ECDSA SignedCms #91183
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Update binder gen emitted-interceptor nullability to match framework impl #91180
    area-Extensions-Configuration, 9.0.0
  • Remove some unused headers and functions #91177
    area-PAL-coreclr, community-contribution
  • BigInteger constructor perf #91176
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Use AVX512 to zero locals #91166
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, arch-avx512

Merged

  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 116.0.5845.110, windows: 116.0.5845.111 #91164
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • JIT: add ability to pad profile counters and adjust scalable count th… #91081
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [NativeAOT] Remove ThunkPool crst. #88778
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0

Updated

  • [release/8.0] [mono] Handle enum return type when inlining CreateInstance #91061
    Servicing-consider, blocked, area-Codegen-JIT-mono, 8.0.0
  • [RISC-V] Fix MarshalStructAsLayoutSeq #90719
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Move event pipe utf8/utf16 string conversion functions to shared event pipe code #90774
    area-Tracing-coreclr
  • Switch to python generated source #91140
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Remove more `ASG` terminlogy from the codebase #86760
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Address feedback from config binding gen PR to improve enum parsing #89952
    area-Extensions-Configuration, community-contribution
  • Emit armv8.4 ldapur* for volatile loads with contained offsets #89681
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • Make handling of DefaultCredentials in NegotiateAuthentication/SocketsHttpHandler more consistent #91138
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Make handling of DefaultCredentials in NegotiateAuthentication/SocketsHttpHandler more consistent (alternative version) #91160
    area-System.Net.Security, community-contribution
  • Activate Quic Alpn Narrowing Test #91116
    area-System.Net.Quic

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • PDB files included in relase build #34962

Updated

  • Re-enable EndToEnd_NoAPI_Web test #33858
  • Package validation fail in .NET 8 with Unnecessary suppressions found #34936
    8.0.1xx
  • Publishing Native AOT in Release mode still producing .pdb files #34959

PullRequests

Updated

  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2253518 #34880
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged
  • [release/8.0] Update IsTargetFrameworkCompatible check #34954
    untriaged, Area-WebSDK

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Missing CS0169 for ref fields without ref-assignments #69736

PullRequests

Created

  • fixing error formatting for generic attribute missing errors #69735
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Improve generic type argument list error recovery #69734
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Updated

  • Use raw strings in EditorFeatures tests #69729
    Area-IDE, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor localization (translation) does not work with multiple languages #50361
  • Publishing blazor project fails with: An element with the same key was already inserted #50360
  • Perf improvement: ApiCrudListProducts, ApiCrudListProducts #50359

Closed

  • Perf regression: mapaction #50355
  • OutputCache attribute not working when not mapping controllers directly #50226
  • Extend `EntityFrameworkCoreDataProtectionExtensions.PersistKeysToDbContext` to accept both TContextService and TContextImplementation #49329
  • is this image bug in blazor server .net7 #50353
  • Perf improvement: fortunes #50354
  • Razor Pages routing breaks when creating web host from separate project #50024

PullRequests

Updated

  • Add feature to expose IIS hosting details #50128
    area-networking
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 1159: Build ID 2253467 #49575
    area-mvc
  • HttpLogging redaction and enrichment #50163
    area-middleware, 8.0-rc2
  • Make IEmailSender more customizable #50301
    area-identity

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-08-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Can only ignore iOS Safe Area when navigation bar is hidden #17022
  • When publishing a DotNet 7 MAUI app, files are recompiled multiple times #17021
  • Shell.Current.CurrentPage is always null #17019

Closed

  • Text alignment not respected in migrated project #11251
    .NET 8 GA
  • .Net Maui Hybrid Blazor app publish issue #17018

PullRequests

Created

  • [net8.0] Merge main to net8.0 #17024
  • Grid distribution fix #17023
    community ✨

Merged

  • Fix the order of logical modifications #17020
  • Fix Android text alignment in migrated projects #16986
    platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮
  • Ignore failures from newly added UITests temporarily #17003
  • [release/8.0.1xx-rc1] Merge net8.0 to 8.0.1xx-rc1 #17007
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️, .NET 8 GA
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #17017
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

Updated

  • Fix for Spinner not disappearing in RefreshView #16997
    area/controls 🎮, control-refreshview, i/regression
  • [WinUI] Fix borders not showing bottom and right side #17016
  • [android] CollectionView logical children grows with Header/Footer #17012
